relevant_statute: Section 18 of the Federal Court Act
decision_reasoning: Farm Credit Corp. and Farm Debt Review Board not considered 'federal boards' due to commercial lending and mediation roles without decision-making powers
cause_of_action: Dissatisfaction with settlement options by Canadian farmers
procedure_followed: Class action lawsuit filed, defendants moved to strike claim for lack of jurisdiction, court reviewed statutes and precedents
result_of_case: Court dismissed plaintiffs' action, interlocutory injunction application struck, confirmed lack of jurisdiction
